Other Information.Additional Info: The pSZ-11% membrane exhibited a methanol permeability of 7.66×10^-9 cm² s^-1, attributed to the size-sieving effect.

Experimental Validation.Method: Gas chromatography measurement of methanol permeability

Other Information.Additional Info: The pSZ membranes demonstrated both high proton conductivity (3.62×10^-2 S cm^-1 at 75℃, 95% RH) and hydroxide conductivity (2.52×10^-3 S cm^-1 at 75℃, 95% RH). The material was applied in direct methanol fuel cells (DMFCs).
